title: Step Rdm Extended Reader
content:
RDM Extended Reader lets you import data from a selected RDM table, including historical values. The step has one input endpoint, which should be connected to a data source with one row that contains parameters for the step. The
                columns in the parameters input source can have arbitrary names; they will be mapped to the configuration fields in the step.

Below is a sample parameters source:

Leaving the timestamp column empty like in the example above is treated as "now."
